headerDisplay:
Sensors have to be flashed before adding to remove the encryption. I recommend using this [flashing tool](https://pvvx.github.io/ATC_MiThermometer/TelinkMiFlasher.html) (This is not made by or supported by me).

Get the MAC Address from the flashing tool, or by using `bluetoothctl scan le` from the terminal
